title: Fish Tacos
tagline: Spiced fish, tangy crema, fresh slaw
ingredients: 1½ lbs firm white fish (mahi, cod, tilapia)
steps: Mix mayo, lime juice, hot sauce for crema.
Mix chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, 1 tsp salt.
Pat fish dry. Cut into strips. Toss with oil and spices.
Cook fish over high heat 2-3 minutes per side until just cooked.
Serve fish in tortillas with cabbage, crema, cilantro, lime.
notes: Mahi or cod hold up best.
Don't overcook - fish should just flake.
